oracle.iam.access.realm

Class ServerAuthenticationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.iam.access.realm.ServerAuthenticationContext

  • public class ServerAuthenticationContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience context that provides access to JASPIC Servlet Profile specific types and functionality.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerAuthenticationContext(javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler handler, javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo message, javax.security.auth.Subject subject, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> option)
      Constructs a ServerAuthenticationContext with the specified properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanSubject()
      Remove method specific principals and credentials from the subject.
      javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler handler()
      Returns the handler that the runtime provided to authentication context.
      javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo message()
      Returns the message info instance for the current request.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> option()
      Returns the module options that were set on the authentication module to which this context belongs.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request()
      Returns the request object associated with the current request.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response()
      Returns the response object associated with the current request.
      javax.security.auth.Subject subject()
      Returns the subject for which authentication is to take place.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerAuthenticationContext

        public ServerAuthenticationContext(javax.security.auth.callback.CallbackHandler handler,
                                   javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo message,
                                   javax.security.auth.Subject subject,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> option)
        Constructs a ServerAuthenticationContext with the specified properties.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler that the runtime provided to authentication context.
        Allowed object is CallbackHandler.
        subject - the subject for which authentication is to take place.
        Possible object is Subject.
        message - the message info instance for the current request.
        Possible object is MessageInfo.
        option - the module options that were set on the authentication module to which this context belongs.
        Allowed object is Map where each element is of type String for the key and String as the value.
